Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring it exceeds expectations in terms of functionality and durability. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well above $8000. However, I understand that every buyer has their own valuation criteria, so I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
